member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string instance to a MD5 hash.
member.param: String to get the MD5 hash.
member.returns: Hexadecimal representation of the input string.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Represents the boolean interpretation of the strings "true", "ok", "yes", "1", "да".
member.param: String value that will be converted to boolean.
member.returns: True if the input string can be converted.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.param: String value that will be converted.
member.remarks: Returns 0 if the input string is not a number.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.param: String value that will be converted.
member.remarks: Returns 0 if the input string is not a number.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.param: String value that will be converted.
member.remarks: Returns 0 if the input string is not a number.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.param: String value that will be converted.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes the first letter of the current string instance.
member.param: The string that will be modified.
member.returns: String with a capitalized first letter.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a substring between and starting from .
member.param: The current string instance.
The left substring from which to start the search.
The right substring from which to start the search.
Position from which to start the search.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all cyrillic letters in the string to the corresponding latin letters.
member.param: The current string instance.
member.returns: String containing the latin representation of all cyrillic letters that appear in the input string.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all latin letters in the string to the corresponding cyrillic letters.
member.param: The current string instance.
member.returns: String containing the cyrillic representation of all latin letters that appear in the input string.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a valid username by replacing all cyrillic letters with the corresponding latin letters and removes all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the symbols '_', '.' and '-').
member.param: The current string instance.
member.returns: String consisting of alphanumeric characters (including the symbols '_', '.' and '-').

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a valid file name by replacing all cyrillic letters with the corresponding latin letters and removes all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding the symbols '_', '.' and '-'). All spaces are replaced with the symbol '-'.
member.param: The current string instance.
member.returns: String consisting of alphanumeric characters (including the symbols '_', '.' and '-').

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first characters of a string starting from the beginning and whose length is the lesser of the string's length and
member.param: The current string instance.
Number of characters in the substring.
member.returns: String containing the first characters of the current string instance.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the extension of a string represented as a file name.
member.param: The current string instance.
member.remarks: Returns an empty string if the input is nat a correct file name.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the corresponding content type of a file extension.
member.param: The current string instance.
member.returns: String representation of the content type.

member.name: M:TelerikStringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a sequence of bytes.
member.param: The current string instance.
member.returns: Byte array containing the byte representation of the string chars.
